.Upgrade To Gold Account Open Steam To Purchase Buying a [c=255,194,14,255]Gold Account[/c] helps fund development and gives you the following neat bonuses. Upgrading to a [c=255,194,14,255]Gold Account[/c] is a one-time permanent upgrade.
[img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Control [c=14,255,14,255]Zombies[/c] while dead / spectating. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Access to exclusive [c=255,194,14,255]Gold Servers[/c]. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Access to various exclusive [c=255,194,14,255]Gold Items[/c] in the shop. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] One of each [c=255,194,14,255]Gold Item[/c] added to Steam Inventory. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Unique [c=255,194,14,255]Emblem[/c] next to username in scoreboards. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Username shows in [c=255,194,14,255]Gold[/c]. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Characters ghost is [c=255,194,14,255]Gold[/c]. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Exclusive [c=255,194,14,255]Gold Paint[/c] and [c=255,194,14,255]Custom Color[/c] to paint your items with! [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Double XP, Gem and Coin drop rates. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Additional [c=255,194,14,255]Character Slots[/c]. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] Additional [c=255,194,14,255]Inventory Storage Space[/c]. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] New characters start with a [c=255,194,14,255]Full Wallet[/c]. [img=game_hud_weaponicon_none_0,1.0,1.0] No more [c=255,194,14,255]Nag-Screen[/c].

[c=235,52,52]MODERATION[/c] Congratulations, you've been randomly selected to help moderate the community!
Periodically the moderate button will be enabled and you will be able to view replays of games that players have been reported in. You will be able to pass judgement on these replays. If your judgements prove to be correct, and consistent with other users judgements, you will continue getting cases to judge.
.Moderation [c=0,200,200,255]Case ID[/c]: %i [c=0,200,200,255]Case Timeframe[/c]: %i+ Minutes [c=0,200,200,255]Reported User[/c]: %s [c=0,200,200,255]Reported For[/c]: %s Please carefully watch the user playing and try to determine if they are guilty of what they were reported for. Ignore any small discrepencies in the replay - bullets missing when they should hit, etc - there may be technical reasons for this, instead look for global evidence that the user is guilty. You will be asked to judge the user after watching the replay. Replay Downloading, %.2f%% ... [c=34,177,76]TUTORIAL[/c] You can move with the [key=left][key=up][key=down][key=right] keys. You can shoot by pressing [key=fire]. You can manually reload by pressing [key=reload]. Hold [key=strafe] while moving to lock your direction. Critical to survival! Press [key=WeaponCycleBackward][key=WeaponCycleForward] to cycle weapons. Blue fodder zombies are harmless if you stay our of their sight. Green chaser zombies are dangerous in groups, they will overwhelm you. Explosive zombies are bullet sponges and do high damage at close range. Large blobby zombies spew out poison. Watch out they can split!> Small blobby zombies are slow, but watch out, they spew out poison. Bouncing zombies are slow to move, but when they jump, they hit hard. Floater zombies can spit blood balls at you, they hurt! Some weapons have an alt-fire you can activate with [key=altfire]. Gems can activate powerful unlocked skills with [key=SkillSlot1][key=SkillSlot2][key=SkillSlot3]. Check out the skills menu. Coins can be used to purchase new items and abilities from the shop, grab them all! You can interact with objects by pressing [key=interact]. Take note of the golden arrows! If your stamina bar is full enough you can press [key=sprint] to sprint away from danger.

.Gameplay Options Enable screen shake? Show interaction arrows? Show interaction messages? Object occlusion transparency? Require input to pickup items? Auto-Fire when aiming? Show numeric stats?
Toggles shaking of the screen when near explosions or when firing certain weapons. Shows bobing arrows about interactable objects. Shows messages on the HUD when near interactable objects. Fades out any objects that occlude (are in front of) the player. Requires the user to press the interact button to pickup items rather than just walking over them. Using the aim/look keys will also fire your weapon. This is similar to the typical twin-stick shooter setup. Shows numeric values for things like health, stamina, xp and similar?

.Graphics Options Resolution: Graphics Mode: Effect Density: Advanced Settings Resolution decides the size of the window the game is rendered to. Graphics mode decides which way the window is displayed. This option globally adjusts the quanity of gibs, particles and similar optional effects on screen. Lowering it can help increase FPS. Provides more detailed adjustments to rendering that can drastically change how the game looks.
.Graphics Options Vertical Sync Enabled? Smoothing Filter Enabled? Post Processing Enabled? Distortion Effects Enabled? Use Legacy Renderer? Show Performance Stats? Show Extended Performance Stats? Vertical sync locks the games frame rate to your monitors refresh rate. This helps to prevent screen-tearing and other graphical artifacts.
The smoothing filter is used to smooth out pixel art when it's upscaled to higher resolutions.
Still very rough, being worked on!
Post processing effects are used to provide a number of fullscreen-effects, such as grey-scale when close to death. Distortion effects are used to make the screen ripple around fire and explosions. It can be taxing for low-end graphics hardware. Show an overlay in-game that displays internal frame-timing information related to performance. Rarely useful for non-developers. Even more detailed version of the perf overlay, included extended timing information. Has high performance overhead! Rarely useful for non-developers. Uses a fixed-function pipeline renderer. The game should be functional, but most graphical effects will be unavailable. Should only be used on very under-powered or unsupported GPUs. Uses a fixed-function pipeline renderer. The game should be functional, but most graphical effects will be unavailable. Should only be used on very under-powered or unsupported GPUs.

Your graphics card appears to not support some of the functionality the game uses. To allow the game to run we have fallen back to a legacy-rendering mode. Everything but basic rendering is disabled - no post-processing, distortion, etc. Some functionality may not render at all.
If you card is not integrated and made within the last ~5 years, please notify us (twindrills.com) as this is likely a mistake on our part!

Small Coin Grab Bag Get a random amount of coins, between 25000 and 50000. Extras Medium Coin Grab Bag Get a random amount of coins, between 50000 and 100000. Extras Large Coin Grab Bag Get a random amount of coins, between 100000 and 250000. Extras
Small Gem Grab Bag Get a 3 random gems. Low chance of rare gems. Extras Medium Gem Grab Bag Get a 5 random gems. Medium chance of rare gems. Extras Large Gem Grab Bag Get a 10 random gems. High chance of rare gems. Extras
Small XP Grab Bag Get a small XP boost equivalent to 50% of a level! Extras Medium XP Grab Bag Get a medium XP boost equivalent to 100% of a level! Extras Large XP Grab Bag Get a large XP boost equivalent to 150% of a level! Extras
Skill Tree Time to lock and load! Get upgrading! Active Skills Active skills can be equipped by your character and can be activated during games. They use different types of dropped gems as a power source. Boundless Bullets [Level 1] You gain infinite ammo for 10 seconds. Boundless Bullets [Level 2] You gain infinite ammo for 20 seconds. Group Boundless Bullets [Level 1] Your whole team gains infinite ammo for 10 seconds. Group Boundless Bullets [Level 2] Your whole team gains infinite ammo for 20 seconds. Group Boundless Bullets [Level 3] Your whole team gains infinite ammo for 30 seconds. Boundless Bullets [Level 3] You gain infinite ammo for 30 seconds. Boundless Bullets [Level 4] You gain infinite ammo for 60 seconds. Ethereal [Level 1] You gain god mode for 5 seconds. Ethereal [Level 2] You gain god mode for 10 seconds. Group Ethereal [Level 1] Your whole team gains god mode for 5 seconds. Group Ethereal [Level 2] Your whole team gains god mode for 10 seconds. Group Ethereal [Level 3] Your whole team gains god mode for 15 seconds. Ethereal [Level 3] You gain god mode for 15 seconds. Ethereal [Level 4] You gain god mode for 30 seconds. Timely Training [Level 1] You gain 50% increased xp for 30 seconds. Timely Training [Level 2] You gain 100% increased xp for 60 seconds. Group Timely Training [Level 1] Your whole team gains 50% increased xp for 30 seconds. Group Timely Training [Level 2] Your whole team gains 150% increased xp for 90 seconds. Group Timely Training [Level 3] Your whole team gains 200% increased xp for 120 seconds. Timely Training [Level 3] You gain 150% increased xp for 90 seconds. Timely Training [Level 4] You gain 200% increased xp for 120 seconds. Rejuvenate [Level 1] You fully heal in 8 seconds. Rejuvenate [Level 2] You fully heal in 5 seconds. Group Rejuvenate [Level 1] Your whole team heals in 8 seconds. Group Rejuvenate [Level 2] Your whole team heals in 5 seconds. Group Rejuvenate [Level 3] Your whole team heals instantly. Rejuvenate [Level 3] You fully heal in 3 seconds. Rejuvenate [Level 4] You fully heal instantly. Adequate Ammo [Level 1] Your ammo refills in 8 seconds. Adequate Ammo [Level 2] Your ammo refills in 5 seconds. Group Adequate Ammo [Level 1] Your whole teams ammo refills in 8 seconds. Group Adequate Ammo [Level 2] Your whole teams ammo refills in 5 seconds. Group Adequate Ammo [Level 3] Your whole teams ammo refills instantly. Adequate Ammo [Level 3] Your ammo refills in 3 seconds. Adequate Ammo [Level 4] Your ammo refills instantly. Annihilation [Level 1] Large explosions are set off in close range. Annihilation [Level 2] Range of enemies killed by bomb is increased by 200%. Fiery Annihilation [Level 1] All enemies that are not killed are set on fire instantly. Fiery Annihilation [Level 2] Damage and radius of explosions is increased further to 400%. Frozen Annihilation [Level 1] All enemies on screen that are not killed are frozen instantly. Frozen Annihilation [Level 2] Damage and radius of explosions is increased further to 400%. Annihilation [Level 3] Damage done by explsions is increased by 200%. Annihilation [Level 4] Damage and radius of explosions is increased further to 400%. Lurker [Level 1] Invisible for 5 seconds, enemies will not attack you. Lurker [Level 2] Invisible for 10 seconds, enemies will not attack you. Group Lurker [Level 1] Your team is Invisible for 10 seconds, enemies will not attack you or them. Group Lurker [Level 2] Your team is Invisible for 20 seconds, enemies will not attack you or them. Group Lurker [Level 3] Your team is Invisible for 30 seconds, enemies will not attack you or them. Lurker [Level 3] Invisible for 20 seconds, enemies will not attack you. Lurker [Level 4] Invisible for 30 seconds, enemies will not attack you. Rapid Restock [Level 1] Your weapons rate of fire and reload speed increases by 20% for 30 seconds. Rapid Restock [Level 2] Your weapons rate of fire and reload speed increases by 50% for 30 seconds. Rapid Restock [Level 3] Your weapons rate of fire and reload speed increases by 70% for 30 seconds. Rapid Restock [Level 4] Your weapons rate of fire and reload speed increases by 100% for 30 seconds. Mystery Weapon You recieve a random weapon. Mystery Weapon [Small Arms] You recieve a random small arms weapon. Mystery Weapon [Shotgun] You recieve a random shotgun weapon. Mystery Weapon [Heavy] You recieve a random heavy weapon. Mystery Weapon [Support] You recieve a random support weapon. Prompt Passing [Level 1] Your weapons insta-kill enemies for 10 seconds. Prompt Passing [Level 2] Your weapons insta-kill enemies for 15 seconds. Group Prompt Passing [Level 1] Your whole teams weapons insta-kill enemies for 10 seconds. Group Prompt Passing [Level 2] Your whole teams weapons insta-kill enemies for 15 seconds. Group Prompt Passing [Level 3] Your whole teams weapons insta-kill enemies for 30 seconds. Prompt Passing [Level 3] Your weapons insta-kill enemies for 20 seconds. Prompt Passing [Level 4] Your weapons insta-kill enemies for 30 seconds. Passive Skills Passive skills are permanent buffs that shape the abilities of your character. Hardiness [Level 1] Your maximum HP is boosted by 10%! Hardiness [Level 2] Your maximum HP is boosted by 25%! Hardiness [Level 3] Your maximum HP is boosted by 50%! Such Skill, Much Wow Instantly gain 5 skill points! We Can Rebuild Him [Level 1] Your health begins to regenerate at 0.3% per second, after taking no damage for 15 seconds. We Can Rebuild Him [Level 2] Your health begins to regenerate at 0.5% per second, after taking no damage for 15 seconds. We Can Rebuild Him [Level 3] Your health begins to regenerate at 1.0% per second, after taking no damage for 15 seconds. Momentum [Level 1] Your maximum speed is boosted by 10%! Momentum [Level 2] Your maximum speed is boosted by 20%! Momentum [Level 3] Your maximum speed is boosted by 30%! Such Skill, Much Wow Instantly gain 5 skill points! Stockpile [Level 1] Your maximum ammo capacity is boosted by 10%! Stockpile [Level 2] Your maximum ammo capacity is boosted by 25%! Stockpile [Level 3] Your maximum ammo capacity is boosted by 100%! Needs Moar Levels Instantly level up! Unending Stockpile [Level 1] Your ammo begins to regenerate at 0.3% per second, after not firing for 15 seconds. Unending Stockpile [Level 2] Your ammo begins to regenerate at 0.5% per second, after not firing for 15 seconds. Unending Stockpile [Level 3] Your ammo begins to regenerate at 1.0% per second, after not firing for 15 seconds. Goldfinger [Level 1] Gold drops increase by 10%! Goldfinger [Level 2] Gold drops increase by 25%! Goldfinger [Level 3] Gold drops increase by 50%! So Broke ... Instantly gain 100,000 gold! Goldeneye [Level 1] Increase gold pickup range by 10%! Goldeneye [Level 2] Increase gold pickup range by 25%! Goldeneye [Level 3] Increase gold pickup range by 50%! Cheapskate [Level 1] Reduce prices paid for items by 10% Cheapskate [Level 2] Reduce prices paid for items by 20% Cheapskate [Level 3] Reduce prices paid for items by 50% Hagler [Level 1] Increase sell price for items by 10% Hagler [Level 2] Increase sell price for items by 20% Hagler [Level 3] Increase sell price for items by 50% Gleaming Gems [Level 1] Gem drops increase by 10%! Gleaming Gems [Level 2] Gem drops increase by 25%! Gleaming Gems [Level 3] Gem drops increase by 50%! So Sparkly Instantly gain 1 of each legit gem. De Bears [Level 1] Increase gem pickup range by 10%! De Bears [Level 2] Increase gem pickup range by 25%! De Bears [Level 3] Increase gem pickup range by 50%! Expedient Experiance [Level 1] XP gained is increased by 10%! Expedient Experiance [Level 2] XP gained is increased by 25%! Expedient Experiance [Level 3] XP gained is increased by 50%! Yeeeees! Yeeeees! Instantly recieve a Bison Cap! Moneybags [Level 1] Increases gold carrying capacity by 50% Moneybags [Level 2] Increases gold carrying capacity by 75% Moneybags [Level 3] Increases gold carrying capacity by 100% Moneybags [Level 4] User gains 1% interest on gold each hour. Hoarder [Level 1] Increases inventory size to 2 pages. Hoarder [Level 2] Increases inventory size to 3 pages. Hoarder [Level 3] Increases inventory size to 4 pages. Play Styles Start leveling up different skills that suit different play styles. Combative Level up for agile close-range combat. Mega Melee [Level 1] Melee weapons do 10% more damage. Mega Melee [Level 2] Melee weapons do 20% more damage. Mega Melee [Level 3] Melee weapons do 50% more damage.
Endurance [Level 1] Stamina recharges 25% faster. Endurance [Level 2] Stamina recharges 50% faster. Endurance [Level 3] Stamina recharges 100% faster.
Rifle Rampage [Level 1] Rifles do 10% more damage. Rifle Rampage [Level 2] Rifles do 20% more damage. Rifle Rampage [Level 3] Rifles do 50% more damage. Rifle Bandolier [Level 1] Rifles have 25% more ammo capacity. Rifle Bandolier [Level 2] Rifles have 50% more ammo capacity. Rifle Bandolier [Level 3] Rifles have 100% more ammo capacity. Phantom Pain [Level 1] You stay as a ghost for 50% longer, giving other players a longer chance to revive you. Phantom Pain [Level 2] You stay as a ghost for 100% longer, giving other players a longer chance to revive you. Phantom Pain [Level 3] You stay as a ghost infinitely until revived. Deadly Level up to deal heavy-damage. Heavy Rampage [Level 1] Heavy weapons do 10% more damage. Heavy Rampage [Level 2] Heavy weapons do 20% more damage. Heavy Rampage [Level 3] Heavy weapons do 50% more damage. Heavy Bandolier [Level 1] Heavy weapons have 25% more ammo capacity. Heavy Bandolier [Level 2] Heavy weapons have 50% more ammo capacity. Heavy Bandolier [Level 3] Heavy weapons have 100% more ammo capacity. Explosive Expanse [Level 1] Explosion produced by weapons have 25% larger radius. Explosive Expanse [Level 2] Explosion produced by weapons have 50% larger radius. Explosive Expanse [Level 3] Explosion produced by weapons have 75% larger radius. Ailing Ailment [Level 1] Status ailments produced by weapons last 25% longer. Ailing Ailment [Level 2] Status ailments produced by weapons last 50% longer. Ailing Ailment [Level 3] Status ailments produced by weapons last 75% longer. Turret Training [Level 1] Turrets spawn with 50% more health. Turret Training [Level 2] Turrets cause 100% more health. Turret Training [Level 3] Turrets cause 200% more health. Turret Bandolier [Level 1] Turrets spawn with 50% more ammo. Turret Bandolier [Level 2] Turrets spawn with 100% more ammo. Turret Bandolier [Level 3] Turrets spawn with 200% more ammo. Supportive Level up skills to help support other players. Small Arms Rampage [Level 1] Small arm weapons (pistols, shotguns, smgs) do 10% more damage. Small Arms Rampage [Level 2] Small arm weapons (pistols, shotguns, smgs) do 25% more damage. Small Arms Rampage [Level 3] Small arm weapons (pistols, shotguns, smgs) do 50% more damage. Small Arms Bandolier [Level 1] Small arm weapons (pistols, shotguns, smgs) have 25% more ammo capacity. Small Arms Bandolier [Level 2] Small arm weapons (pistols, shotguns, smgs) have 50% more ammo capacity. Small Arms Bandolier [Level 3] Small arm weapons (pistols, shotguns, smgs) have 100% more ammo capacity. Buff Boundry [Level 1] Buff grenades have a 25% larger area of effect. Buff Boundry [Level 2] Buff grenades have a 50% larger area of effect. Buff Boundry [Level 3] Buff grenades have a 100% larger area of effect. Buff Bandolier [Level 1] You can carry 50% more buff grenades. Buff Bandolier [Level 2] You can carry 100% more buff grenades. Buff Bandolier [Level 3] You can carry 150% more buff grenades. Rebirth [Level 1] You can revive other playes 50% faster. Rebirth [Level 2] You can revive other players 100% faster. Rebirth [Level 3] You can revive other players 200% faster. Accelerated Alleviation [Level 1] You can heal players 50% more efficiently with healing weapons. Accelerated Alleviation [Level 2] You can heal players 100% more efficiently with healing weapons. Accelerated Alleviation [Level 3] You can heal players 200% more efficiently with healing weapons.

TIP: [c=50,160,235]Blue goo[/c] on the floor? Try pressing [key=altfire]! TIP: Combine gems with items to increase their stats! TIP: Coins can be used to purchase new items! TIP: Zombies are bad for your health. TIP: Paint your items to make yourself unique! TIP: Be careful with explosives, they hurt! TIP: Use the skill tree to buff your player! TIP: Infinitus and Jordizzle are the developers! TIP: This game is best played with a gamepad! TIP: Coins picked up are only recieved at the end of each game! TIP: Fat zombies are especially vulnerable to fire and electric damage! TIP: Active skills require the use of gems, but have powerful effects!
